brief: Regulation 2: No smoking near Space Elevators.
prompt: Dear all Ficsit Pioneers, R&D would like to remind you that due to the nature of the equipment, Space Elevator parts a highly vulnerable in the presence of tar. R&D would like to remind you that the consumption of Tabaco products is prohibited with in 2 miles of any Space Elevator deployment.
